verbose_text: To validate the binding of [11 C] 5 to P2RY12, sections of both vehicle injected mouse brain and rIL4 injected mouse brain (sacrificed 16 h post injection) were incubated with a buffer solution of [11 C] 5 (10 nM), as well as with the same tracer solution containing the non structurally related P2RY12 antagonist ticagrelor (10 muM).
